WorkItem.Description:
Hi. I recently update a WPF application which was using an older version of GMap.Net to the latest version on NuGet 1.7.1.

Since the update, I am getting some errors. It looks like GMapMarker.Route and GMapMarker.RegenerateRouteShape do not exist anymore? Is there an alternate implementation that I should be using now?

My code is as follows:
```
GMapMarker routeMarker = new GMapMarker();
routeMarker.Route.AddRange((IEnumerable<PointLatLng>)mapRoute.Points);
routeMarker.RegenerateRouteShape(gMapControl1);
```

It complains on the bottom two lines....

The errors are:

_'GMapMarker' does not contain a definition for 'Route' and no extension method 'Route' accepting a first argument of type 'GMapMarker' could be found (are you missing a using directive or an assembly reference?)_

_'GMapMarker' does not contain a definition for 'RegenerateRouteShape' and no extension method 'RegenerateRouteShape' accepting a first argument of type 'GMapMarker' could be found (are you missing a using directive or an assembly reference?)_
WorkItem.Summary: Changes in latest version of GMap.Net (WPF)
